11#include <sys/socket.h>
12#include "ipc_def.h"
13
14typedef struct ipcmsghdr {
15 struct cmsghdr header;
16 int __room_for_fd_with_pad[4];
17} IPCMSGHDR;
18
19struct _ip_vi_win;
20
21typedef struct _ip_private {
22 int i_fd; /* Input file descriptor. */
23 int o_fd; /* Output file descriptor. */
24 int t_fd; /* Terminal file descriptor. */
25
26 int argc;
27 char **argv;
28
29 size_t row; /* Current row. */
30 size_t col; /* Current column. */
31
32 db_recno_t sb_total; /* scrollbar: total lines in file. */
33 db_recno_t sb_top; /* scrollbar: top line on screen. */
34 size_t sb_num; /* scrollbar: number of lines on screen. */
35
36 size_t iblen; /* Input buffer length. */
37 size_t iskip; /* Returned input buffer. */
38 char ibuf[256]; /* Input buffer. */
39
40 CHAR_T tbuf[256]; /* Input keys. */
41
42#define IP_IN_EX 0x0001 /* Currently running ex. */
43#define IP_ON_ALTERNATE 0x0002 /* Alternate on. */
44#define IP_SCR_VI_INIT 0x0004 /* Vi screen initialized. */
45 u_int32_t flags;
46} IP_PRIVATE;
47
48#define IPP(sp) ((IP_PRIVATE *)((sp)->wp->ip_private))
49#define WIPP(wp) ((IP_PRIVATE *)((wp)->ip_private))
50
51/* The screen line relative to a specific window. */
52#define RLNO(sp, lno) (sp)->roff + (lno)
53#define RCNO(sp, cno) (sp)->coff + (cno)
54
55#define IPO_CODE_LEN 1 /* Length of a code value. */
56#define IPO_INT_LEN 4 /* Length of an integer. */
57
58/* A structure that can hold the information for any frame. */
59typedef struct _ip_buf {
60 int code; /* Event code. */
61 const char *str1; /* String #1. */
62 u_int32_t len1; /* String #1 length. */
63 const char *str2; /* String #1. */
64 u_int32_t len2; /* String #1 length. */
65 u_int32_t val1; /* Value #1. */
66 u_int32_t val2; /* Value #2. */
67 u_int32_t val3; /* Value #3. */
68} IP_BUF;
69
70typedef int (*IPFunc) (struct _ip_vi_win *);
71typedef int (*IPFunc_1) (struct _ip_vi_win *, u_int32_t);
72typedef int (*IPFunc_1a) (struct _ip_vi_win *, u_int32_t, const char *, u_int32_t);
73typedef int (*IPFunc_a) (struct _ip_vi_win *, const char *, u_int32_t);
74typedef int (*IPFunc_ab1) (struct _ip_vi_win *, const char *, u_int32_t,
75 const char *, u_int32_t, u_int32_t);
76typedef int (*IPFunc_12) (struct _ip_vi_win *, u_int32_t, u_int32_t);
77typedef int (*IPFunc_123) (struct _ip_vi_win *, u_int32_t, u_int32_t, u_int32_t);
78
79typedef int (*IPUnmarshall) (struct _ip_vi_win *, IP_BUF *, IPFunc);
80
81typedef struct _ipfunlist {
82 const char *format;
83 IPUnmarshall unmarshall;
84 size_t offset;
85} IPFUNLIST;
86
87typedef struct _vipfunlist {
88 const char *format;
89 e_event_t e_event;
90} VIPFUNLIST;
91
92typedef struct ip_si_operations {
93 IPFunc_a addstr;
94 IPFunc_12 attribute;
95 IPFunc bell;
96 IPFunc busy_off;
97 IPFunc_a busy_on;
98 IPFunc clrtoeol;
99 IPFunc deleteln;
100 IPFunc discard;
101 IPFunc_ab1 editopt;
102 IPFunc insertln;
103 IPFunc_12 move;
104 IPFunc quit;
105 IPFunc redraw;
106 IPFunc refresh;
107 IPFunc_a rename;
108 IPFunc_1 rewrite;
109 IPFunc_123 scrollbar;
110 IPFunc_a select;
111 IPFunc split;
112 IPFunc_a waddstr;
113} IPSIOPS;
114
115struct _ip_vi;
116typedef struct _ip_vi IPVI;
117
118struct _ip_vi_win;
119typedef struct _ip_vi_win IPVIWIN;
120
121struct _ip_vi {
122 int ifd; /* Input file descriptor. */
123 int ofd; /* Output file descriptor. */
124 pid_t pid;
125
126 void *private_data;
127
128 u_int32_t flags;
129
130 int (*run) __P((IPVI*, int, char*[]));
131 int (*new_window) __P((IPVI *, IPVIWIN **, int));
132 int (*close) __P((IPVI*));
133};
134
135struct _ip_vi_win {
136 int ifd; /* Input file descriptor. */
137 int ofd; /* Output file descriptor. */
138
139 void *private_data;
140
141 IPSIOPS *si_ops;
142
143 int (*c_bol) __P((IPVIWIN*));
144 int (*c_bottom) __P((IPVIWIN*));
145 int (*c_del) __P((IPVIWIN*));
146 int (*c_eol) __P((IPVIWIN*));
147 int (*c_insert) __P((IPVIWIN*));
148 int (*c_left) __P((IPVIWIN*));
149 int (*c_right) __P((IPVIWIN*));
150 int (*c_top) __P((IPVIWIN*));
151 int (*c_settop) __P((IPVIWIN*, u_int32_t));
152
153 int (*string) __P((IPVIWIN*, const char*, u_int32_t));
154 int (*wq) __P((IPVIWIN*));
155 int (*quit) __P((IPVIWIN*));
156 int (*resize) __P((IPVIWIN*, u_int32_t, u_int32_t));
157
158 int (*input) __P((IPVIWIN*, int));
159 int (*close) __P((IPVIWIN*));
160
161 int (*set_ops) __P((IPVIWIN*, IPSIOPS*));
162};
163
164/*
165 * Screen/editor IP_CODE's.
166 *
167 * The program structure depends on the event loop being able to return
168 * IPO_EOF/IPO_ERR multiple times -- eventually enough things will end
169 * due to the events that vi will reach the command level for the screen,
170 * at which point the exit flags will be set and vi will exit.
171 *
172 * IP events sent from the screen to vi.
173 */
174#define CODE_OOB 0 /* Illegal code. */
175#if 0
176#define VI_C_BOL 1 /* Cursor to start of line. */
177#define VI_C_BOTTOM 2 /* Cursor to bottom. */
178#define VI_C_DEL 3 /* Cursor delete. */
179#define VI_C_DOWN 4 /* Cursor down N lines: IPO_INT. */
180#define VI_C_EOL 5 /* Cursor to end of line. */
181#define VI_C_INSERT 6 /* Cursor: enter insert mode. */
182#define VI_C_LEFT 7 /* Cursor left. */
183#define VI_C_PGDOWN 8 /* Cursor down N pages: IPO_INT. */
184#define VI_C_PGUP 9 /* Cursor up N lines: IPO_INT. */
185#define VI_C_RIGHT 10 /* Cursor right. */
186#define VI_C_SEARCH 11 /* Cursor: search: IPO_INT, IPO_STR. */
187#define VI_C_SETTOP 12 /* Cursor: set screen top line: IPO_INT. */
188#define VI_C_TOP 13 /* Cursor to top. */
189#define VI_C_UP 14 /* Cursor up N lines: IPO_INT. */
190#define VI_EDIT 15 /* Edit a file: IPO_STR. */
191#define VI_EDITOPT 16 /* Edit option: 2 * IPO_STR, IPO_INT. */
192#define VI_EDITSPLIT 17 /* Split to a file: IPO_STR. */
193#define VI_EOF 18 /* End of input (NOT ^D). */
194#define VI_ERR 19 /* Input error. */
195#define VI_INTERRUPT 20 /* Interrupt. */
196#define VI_MOUSE_MOVE 21 /* Mouse click move: IPO_INT, IPO_INT. */
197#define VI_QUIT 22 /* Quit. */
198#define VI_RESIZE 23 /* Screen resize: IPO_INT, IPO_INT. */
199#define VI_SEL_END 24 /* Select end: IPO_INT, IPO_INT. */
200#define VI_SEL_START 25 /* Select start: IPO_INT, IPO_INT. */
201#define VI_SIGHUP 26 /* SIGHUP. */
202#define VI_SIGTERM 27 /* SIGTERM. */
203#define VI_STRING 28 /* Input string: IPO_STR. */
204#define VI_TAG 29 /* Tag. */
205#define VI_TAGAS 30 /* Tag to a string: IPO_STR. */
206#define VI_TAGSPLIT 31 /* Split to a tag. */
207#define VI_UNDO 32 /* Undo. */
208#define VI_WQ 33 /* Write and quit. */
209#define VI_WRITE 34 /* Write. */
210#define VI_WRITEAS 35 /* Write as another file: IPO_STR. */
211#define VI_FLAGS 36 /* Flags passed to nvi_create */
212#endif
213
214#define VI_SEARCH_EXT 0x001 /* VI_C_SEARCH: ignore case. */
215#define VI_SEARCH_IC 0x002 /* VI_C_SEARCH: ignore case. */
216#define VI_SEARCH_ICL 0x004 /* VI_C_SEARCH: ignore case if lower-case. */
217#define VI_SEARCH_INCR 0x008 /* VI_C_SEARCH: incremental search. */
218#define VI_SEARCH_LIT 0x010 /* VI_C_SEARCH: literal string. */
219#define VI_SEARCH_REV 0x020 /* VI_C_SEARCH: reverse direction. */
220#define VI_SEARCH_WR 0x040 /* VI_C_SEARCH: wrap at sof/eof. */
221
222/*
223 * IP events sent from vi to the screen.
224 */
225#if 0
226#define SI_ADDSTR 1 /* Add a string: IPO_STR. */
227#define SI_ATTRIBUTE 2 /* Set screen attribute: 2 * IPO_INT. */
228#define SI_BELL 3 /* Beep/bell/flash the terminal. */
229#define SI_BUSY_OFF 4 /* Display a busy message: IPO_STR. */
230#define SI_BUSY_ON 5 /* Display a busy message: IPO_STR. */
231#define SI_CLRTOEOL 6 /* Clear to the end of the line. */
232#define SI_DELETELN 7 /* Delete a line. */
233#define SI_DISCARD 8 /* Discard the screen. */
234#define SI_EDITOPT 9 /* Edit option: 2 * IPO_STR, IPO_INT. */
235#define SI_INSERTLN 10 /* Insert a line. */
236#define SI_MOVE 11 /* Move the cursor: 2 * IPO_INT. */
237#define SI_QUIT 12 /* Quit. */
238#define SI_REDRAW 13 /* Redraw the screen. */
239#define SI_REFRESH 14 /* Refresh the screen. */
240#define SI_RENAME 15 /* Rename the screen: IPO_STR. */
241#define SI_REPLY 16 /* Reply: IPO_INT (0/1), IPO_STR. */
242#define SI_REWRITE 17 /* Rewrite a line: IPO_INT. */
243#define SI_SCROLLBAR 18 /* Reset the scrollbar: 3 * IPO_INT. */
244#define SI_SELECT 19 /* Select area: IPO_STR. */
245#define SI_SPLIT 20 /* Split the screen. */
246#define SI_EVENT_MAX 20
247#endif
248
249#include "ipc_extern.h"
250#include "ip_extern.h"
